entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Minnedosa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 07:54 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or light snow ending late this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
